name: Pianedo
description:
Small katamari inspired game in which you play as a small black hole exploring a procedurally generated planet and consuming everything on you path.

Made forPROCJAM 2021.

Needs a lot of polish, bugfixes and optimization, but for now I am happy with the planet generation :)

Controls:

  • Drag mouse left to steer left/right
  • Esc to pause

Environment assets:

LowPoly Environment Pack - k0rveen
